- - Consultant Services Email - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Melissa, Sounds good  please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks!Sara From: Melissa Washington [mailto:melissa@smartnetstrategies.com] Sent: Monday, June 04, 2012 9:58 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Melissa Washington Thanks Sara, I will check it out.Melissa
Sent from my iPhone On Jun 4, 2012, at 7:50 AM, "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Dear Melissa, We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you. We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email. Regards, Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgwNTAmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1tZWxpc3NhQHNtYXJ0bmV0c3RyYXRlZ2llcy5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTIwMDI2LTExNTQ1MTMtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons67JZKXonjHpfsX56ukpXKa1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsFrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D></html
